title: Vaibhavam Double-Layer Haaram with Pink Manya Drops
features: Intricate filigree work with floral and peacock motifs in the lower haaram layer. Emeralds and Rubies are prong-set to showcase their brilliance. The pendant features a floral design with a central Emerald surrounded by Polki Diamonds and dangling Pink Manya drops. 'Hyderabadi Polish' enhances the gold's luster. The design is inspired by traditional temple jewelry (Devalayam designs) but modernized with the use of pink quartz.
occasions: and grand receptions. Also suitable for high-end social events and formal gatherings.
description: A masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship, this Haaram is a timeless investment. The combination of precious gemstones and Polki diamonds creates a dazzling effect. The inclusion of Pink Manya adds a modern touch while maintaining the necklace's traditional elegance. This piece is not just jewelry; it's a family heirloom to be cherished for generations.
